subject: Football (College)
Paralysis
Disabilities
lead_paragraph: Marc Buoniconti’s collision with Herman Jacobs transformed their lives, with Buoniconti helping create the Miami Project to Cure Paralysis and Jacobs, after years of aimlessness, revitalized by their friendship.
snippet: Marc Buoniconti’s collision with Herman Jacobs transformed their lives, with Buoniconti helping create the Miami Project to Cure Paralysis and Jacobs, after years of aimlessness, revitalized by their friendship.
